thread.title: Ground News - Israel Welcomes Biden Plan to Increase Gaza Aid
thread.title_full: Ground News - Israel Welcomes Biden Plan to Increase Gaza Aid

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Israel Welcomes Biden Plan to Increase Gaza Aid
text:
Summary by Ground News President Joe Biden says U.S. military will establish a temporary pier on the Gaza coast to deliver aid. Biden also pushed Israel to do more to help the humanitarian crisis in Gaza. Israeli officials said they welcomed the initiative, and Israel will do whatever is necessary to help. Palestinians are worried that Israel intends a long occupation of Gaza, analyst says. Share menu 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
VOA News Center High Factuality Government: U.S. Agency for Global Media Israel Welcomes Biden Plan to Increase Gaza Aid Jerusalem — President Joe Biden announced the U.S. military will establish a temporary pier on the Gaza coast to deliver aid. Biden also pushed Israel to do more to help the humanitarian crisis in Gaza. President Joe Biden says the U.S. has plans to help solve the humanitarian crisis in Gaza. The president said he is directing the U.S. military to lead an emergency mission to establish a temporary pier in the Mediterranean on the Gaza coast that…
